snippet: “He wasn’t talking. He was looking from the window of the car all the way. Two adults in the front seat spoke quietly under their breath. He could have listened if he wanted to, but he didn’t.”
lead_paragraph: “He wasn’t talking. He was looking from the window of the car all the way. Two adults in the front seat spoke quietly under their breath. He could have listened if he wanted to, but he didn’t.”

headline.seo: Excerpt — ‘The Cat’s Table’ — By Michael Ondaatje
